short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the feeling of sitting home while it's slightly raining outside to your work - cozy and calm rainy wallpapers for your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to installing the Rain Tab extension and setting Chrome™ new tab to that provided by the service and the EULA and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your search engine to be provided by Microsoft Bing.

🌧️ Introducing Rain Tab 🌧️, your gateway to tranquility and focus, right in your browser. This is an innovative Chrome extension designed to bring the calming ambiance of a gentle rainy day ☔ to your workspace, irrespective of where you are. This immersive extension encapsulates the feeling of sitting cozily at home 🏡, while the soothing melody of raindrops falling outside resonates in the background, all in an attempt to foster a more peaceful and productive work environment.

🖼️ Enjoy the serenity of high-quality rainy wallpapers that grace your browser with each new tab. Immerse yourself in the delicate symphony of rainfall with beautiful, ever-changing backgrounds. Each visual is carefully curated to inspire a sense of tranquility and peace 🕊️, offering the perfect escape from the hectic chaos of everyday life.

📝  With an integrated to-do list, you can effortlessly organize your day, set your tasks, and monitor your progress right from your browser. Manage your tasks without switching between tabs or applications, streamlining your productivity without ever disrupting your calm.

🖥️ For those moments when you really need to zone in, Rain Tab offers a fullscreen mode. With just one click, let your browser transcend into a visual spectacle that maximizes focus. Eliminate distractions and get immersed in your work with the ethereal backdrop of a rainy landscape.

🔍 Our extension also features a seamless search functionality, offering quick and easy web navigation. Now, you can find what you're looking for without leaving the tranquil setting, keeping your workflow smooth and uninterrupted.

Rain Tab offers a perfect blend of calm and functionality that cultivates a productive and serene workspace. From the captivating imagery of rainy landscapes 🌲🌧️ to the practical features designed to boost your productivity,  this add-on truly transforms your browser into a place of peace and efficiency.

Step into a world where productivity meets tranquility and let the soothing rhythms of rain ☔ fuel your workday. Embark on a journey towards a more balanced and harmonious workspace where the rains of serenity never cease.
